content.question: Nigeria’s democratization process is best described as a

choices.label: smooth transition from colonial rule to self-rule
successful effort to dismantle the prebendal system
process imposed by the country’s former colonial rulers
process interrupted by frequent military intervention

content.answer: process interrupted by frequent military intervention

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
